name: Bens Poppin' Poppers
description: 8 jalapeno poppers packed with a delicious Beecher's three-cheese blend and mini bits of brisket

name: Bens Whoppin' Whoppers
description: 4 Mini 'whopper' burgers with our signature whoppin sauce (Totally not stolen from Whataburger)

name: Cut Corners
description: Because our kitchen staff doesn't know how to cut potato wedges...

name: Ben's Bus
description: Traditional BLT on the world's longest (13-inch) sourdough bread

name: Ben's Cheese Burger
description: Simple 1/4-lb pattie with a slice of Beecher's chedder, giving Dick's a run for it's money.

name: Ben's Big Burger
description: Not simple 1/2-lb pattie with two-slices of Beecher's chedder, our signature whoppin sauce, and a handful of salad greens with a tomato slice

name: THE CHOCOLATE MOUNTAIN
description: Our signature and award winning mountain of chocolate cake topped with a chocolate drizzle

name: Yo Mama's Cookies
description: 3 Chocolate Chip cookies, just like yo mama used to make. Milk not included

name: Yo Mama's Lemonade
description: Fresh squeezed lemonade with three tablespoons of sugar. Just like yo mama probably used to make.

name: Gin and Tonic
description: 2oz shot of Bombay Gin and fizzy tonic water and a squeeze of lime for a crisp 8oz refresher

name: NO-BOAT Rando
description: Random 8oz pour of rotating tap. Ask your local server for the current keg.
